Web Player Themes

The CSS files are available both in minified or extended version
For example:
pwp-dark.css
pwp-dark.min.css

CSS theme files can be found here:
dist/css/pwp-<name-of-theme>.css

Choose one of the color presets

See all previews of available Themes.

Create Your Own Theme

After modifying colors, check resulting color contrasts, they might not fully fit accessibility standards.

Path to theme folder:

/src/sass/themes/

Open any scss file and modify an existing theme by playing with colors and changing their values:
For example _light.scss

//
// Light Theme
// --------------------------------------------------

$theme: (
    player-base:     #fff,
    player-contrast: #000,
    meta-base:       #fff,
    meta-contrast:   #535353,
    accent-base:     #42478a,
    accent-contrast: #fff
);
After modifying colors, check resulting color contrasts, they might not fully meet accessibility standards.

Advanced Mode:
If you know what you're doing, you could also modify the color functions.
Open file:
/src/sass/_colors.scss
